Content:: La Bachellerie (French pronunciation: [la baʃɛlʁi]; Occitan: La Bachalariá) is a commune in the Dordogne department in southwestern France. The French sprinter, journalist and writer Guy Lagorce was born in La Bachellerie in 1937.  This Dordogne geographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: La Bachellerie - Wikipedia
